Key Match Events: Daniel James scored the fourth goal for Wales in the 86th minute.
Neco Williams scored a free-kick goal in the 38th minute.
Brennan Johnson scored the third goal for Wales in the 47th minute.
David Brooks scored the opening goal for Wales in the 3rd minute.
Teemu Pukki scored for Finland in the 45th minute.
Pre-Game Insights: Rob Page's side aimed for a third consecutive run at European glory.
Wales needed to navigate Finland at Cardiff City Stadium ahead of a potential spot in the final against either Poland or Estonia.
Post-Match Reflections: Rob Page commented on the team's strong start and emphasized the importance of the upcoming game against Poland.
Neco Williams expressed satisfaction with the team's performance but noted the disappointment of conceding a goal.
Wales will face Poland next week for a place in the Euro 2024 finals.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Finland's last outing was against San Marino, and they made several changes for this match.
Wales and Finland have met 15 times historically, with Wales winning six times and Finland four times.
